item.title: Ayo Edebiri, Don Cheadle to Make Broadway Debuts in ‘Proof’
item.description: The revival of the play, directed by ‘Hamilton’s’ Thomas Kail, is set to open in April 2026.

item.title: Don Cheadle and Ayo Edebiri to Make Broadway Debuts in ‘Proof’ Revival
item.description: Academy Award nominee Don Cheadle and Emmy, SAG and Golden Globe winner Ayo Edebiri will make their Broadway debuts next spring in the first New York revival of David Auburn’s Tony Award- and Pulitzer

item.title: NY Film Festival Sets ‘After the Hunt’ as Opening Night Movie
item.description: The Luca Guadagnino-directed title from Amazon MGM Studios stars Julia Roberts, Ayo Edebiri and Andrew Garfield and will receive its North American premiere at the Manhattan event.
